data.title: Ivy Rehab for Kids: Physical, Occupational and Speech Therapy
data.meta_description: Ivy Rehab for Kids provides pediatric physical therapy, occupational therapy and speech therapy in a caring environment with one-on-one attention.
data.text:
Our skilled staff provides individualized treatment plans specifically for your child’s needs and development. Whether it’s improving sensory processing skills, handwriting, mobility, self-regulation, developmental delays, motor coordination, social skills, or other needs, our compassionate team specializes in a variety of pediatric conditions and are dedicated to helping your child achieve their goals.

We go above and beyond when it comes to the treatment of our young patients. Our staff at Ivy Rehab for Kids is dedicated to individual attention and customized plans to meet your child’s needs.
